task.title: Enable TestOps - Jira integration in Jira software
task.shortdesc: You can configure TestOps - Jira integration for test management in Jira. This configuration allows you to write BDD scenarios in Jira tickets and view test results from linked test cases in Jira.

li.p: This integration is only available for Jira Cloud.

context.p: To enable TestOps - Jira integration in Jira software, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Open your Jira projects. Your Jira page name follows the following syntax: <sitename>.atlassian.net.
At the bottom of the left panel, click Project settings.
Scroll down the left panel, expand the App section and select Katalon Settings. The Katalon settings page appears as below.

image.alt: Configure Katalon settings in Jira Software

step.cmd: Fill in the information as follows:

li.p: Email: Enter the email address you have registered for your Katalon account.
API Key: Enter a TestOps API key. To learn more about generating a TestOps API key, you can refer to this document: .

step.cmd: Click Fetch organizations, then select your organization from the dropdown list.

taskbody.result: You have successfully enabled TestOps - Jira integration in Jira software. You can now write BDD test cases in Jira tickets or view test results in Jira tickets and gadgets.
